article: May 2 , Saturday We arrived in Hangzhou at 3 : 00p . m . After we walked out of the train station , we took a taxi to the hotel . The hotel was very clean . We stayed there for three days . Then we wanted to travel to Hainan . May 5 , Tuesday In the morning we went to Hainan by plane . The people in Hainan were very friendly . Then we went to a beautiful beach . It was sunny . So we had great fun playing in the water . May 7 , Thursday It was rainy today . So we went to a museum . We saw many old things there . Then we went to the aquarium to see some sea animals . We saw many kinds of fish . They were very lovely . I hope I could come to Hainan again .
questions: Which of the following is NOT true ?

model: the writer took a train to hainan
it took them a long time to find some fish in hainan
human: The writer wanted to visit Hainan again
The writer took a train to Hainan
